java.io

Class ObjectOutputStream.PutField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.ObjectOutputStream.PutField
  • Enclosing class:
    ObjectOutputStream

    public abstract static class ObjectOutputStream.PutField
extends Object
    This class allows a class to specify exactly which fields should be written, and what values should be written for these fields. XXX: finish up comments
